description.title: Latency - key storage, event log receipt time
description.purpose: The test uses N web3.js clients to submit a transaction to set a key value pair in the KeyStorage contract, and set up an event subscriber which filters on that key pair. Once the event triggers the subscriber, the process is repeated using the same key but a monoticially increased value. The client signs the transaction locally and measured the time between sending the signed transaction to the network, and the receipt of the event log. Multiple clients are run concurrently using unique keys, and the overall latency profile is produced by binning the latency into increments and plotting as a distribution.
